Text: Sorry, there is a hardware failure problem with this.
Problem fixed. Alles ist gut. Tak.
Disc 2 (episodes 05-08) will have artwork in the form of a DVD case insert.
Hey Marthafar shall you be uploading the rest of the series? This dvd format is rare to find online, would be awesome if you could.

I put the files into DVD format precisely because there didn't seem to be any! I used the set available on here containing MP4s, SRTs and JPGs. The JPGs became the menu images. As the series is hardsubbed and the SRTs are for viewers with impaired hearing (and aren't as good as the hard subs anyway), they were discarded. 

I've got another three discs with the remaining episodes. I'm currently experiencing some hardware problems, but I hope to get the rest of the series up soon, especially 9-12 as that's next in sequence!

Marthafar,

I want to thank you for your work of putting this series here.
The quality is very good. 
Very professional of your part.

;-)
Xanthippe
Thanks a lot for your offer and all the work you put into it, this show is really great!
